WHERE o.fieldId = #{fieldId} AND o.deleted != true AND o.disabled != true

SELECT o.* FROM IsuCustomFieldOption o

mapper.insert: insert into IsuCustomFieldOption (label,value,ordr,fieldId,isDefault,isBuildIn, createTime,deleted,disabled) values (#{label},#{value},#{ordr},#{fieldId},#{isDefault},#{isBuildIn}, NOW(),FALSE,FALSE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM IsuCustomFieldOption o WHERE o.ordr < #{ordr} AND o.fieldId = #{fieldId} AND o.deleted != TRUE ORDER BY o.ordr DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM IsuCustomFieldOption o WHERE o.ordr > #{ordr} AND o.fieldId = #{fieldId} AND o.deleted != TRUE ORDER BY o.ordr ASC LIMIT 1
